name: The Magpie
description:
Magpie

noun
a bird with black and white feathers and a long tail:
Magpies are attracted to small, shiny objects, which they carry away to their nests.

Play our short GameJam project about a magpie collecting food and gems, while pooping on police officers and dodging falcons.

Controls

Good luck and enjoy our shitty game :>
